ITEM.name: The Native Apps Builder mkmk
ITEM.text: explains its principles and what is does for developers

ITEM.name: The Prerequisites on Windows
ITEM.text: is about explicitly declaring DLLs

ITEM.name: The XML IdentityCard Special File
ITEM.text: explains its purpose and use

ITEM.name: Migrating Your Identity Cards to XML
ITEM.text: helps you convert your IdentityCard.h files to IdentityCard.xml files

ITEM.name: The IdentityCard Special File
ITEM.text: is now deprecated and should not be used

ITEM.name: The Imakefile.mk Special File
ITEM.text: is how to control the compilation of programs

ITEM.name: mkmk Handbook
ITEM.text: is a summary of mkmk capabilities

ITEM.name: mkmk
ITEM.text: the V6 code builder

ITEM.name: Summary of Commands around mkmk
ITEM.text: gives links to the mkmk family commands

ITEM.name: mkIc2Xml
ITEM.text: to convert a .h Identity Card to an XML one

ITEM.name: mkCreateIC
ITEM.text: to create an empty Identity Card ready to be edited using mkICE

ITEM.name: mkICE
ITEM.text: to interactively edit an XML Identity Card, or open a .h Identity Card to save it as an XML one

ITEM.name: mkGetPreq
ITEM.text: to construct a concatenation of prerequisites.

ITEM.name: mkCopyPreq
ITEM.text: to copy the prerequisite frameworks into a workspace.

ITEM.name: mkPrintPreq
ITEM.text: to display the direct and indirect prerequisite frameworks.

ITEM.name: mkCopyFw
ITEM.text: to copy frameworks into a workspace.

ITEM.name: mkRmFw
ITEM.text: to delete frameworks from a workspace.

ITEM.name: mkRemoveDo
ITEM.text: to delete derived objects.

ITEM.name: mkCreateRuntimeView
ITEM.text: to create a run time view.

ITEM.name: mkrun
ITEM.text: to execute a program.

ITEM.name: Files and Folders Created by mkmk
ITEM.text: to find answers to usual questions regarding mkmk family commands
